exhibition.description: 김용익 개인전 '아련하고 희미한 유토피아'는 작가의 최근 '소진 프로젝트' 시리즈를 통해 모더니즘 유토피아의 퇴색하는 꿈을 탐구합니다. 작가는 '유토피아는 모더니스트의 꿈이었고, 과학과 기술적 진보가 인류를 유토피아로 이끌 것이라는 꿈이었다'고 말하며, 46점의 근작을 통해 모더니즘 이상의 한계와 실패를 성찰합니다.
exhibition.description_en: Kim Yong-Ik's solo exhibition 'Distant and Faraway Utopia' explores the fading dream of Modernist utopia through his recent 'Exhausting Project' series. The artist reflects on the limitations and failures of Modernist ideals through 46 recent works, stating 'Utopia was the Modernist dream... the dream that science and technological progress would lead humanity to utopia.'
exhibition.gallery_location: Kukje Gallery Busan and Seoul Hanok spaces
exhibition.curatorial_statement: Exploring the fading dream of Modernist utopia and challenging paradigms through art's sustainability and transformation

exhausting_project.concept: Using remaining art supplies as form of artistic and philosophical practice
exhausting_project.philosophical_basis: Self-renewal through modest, introspective art practice

artistic_philosophy.central_theme: Critique of Modernist project's dream of utopia
artistic_philosophy.eastern_influence: Book of Changes (易經) philosophical framework
artistic_philosophy.balance_concept: Bitter despair balanced with small glimmers of hope

conceptual_framework.philosophical_depth: Eastern wisdom applied to contemporary art practice

exhibition.artist_statement: Utopia was the Modernist dream... the dream that science and technological progress would lead humanity to utopia.

exhibition_significance.dual_venue: Expanded presentation across Busan and Seoul
exhibition_significance.mature_perspective: Senior artist's reflection on art history and progress
exhibition_significance.cultural_critique: Korean perspective on Western Modernist ideology
